title: after updating the OS to version 10 on my google pixel, there were a huge number of problems
content: after updating the OS to version 10 on my google pixel, there were a huge number of problems: google play crashes, there is no way to save photos or screenshots, the battery discharges noticeably faster, calls are not always registered. smartphone with one update turned into a brick! I donâ€™t think that resetting to factory settings will change anything.
